Text.Page:
The Press Camp...we called it that because anyone who was captured was pressed in to service.

Now we're using it to press on. The camp's location turned out to be more important than we thought, and we've managed to hold on to it through thick and thin.

The {@LinkCreature:11#1009#Red Lash reapers} are trying to take it from us. Stop them, !

That's a lot of kill trophies, .

And now you see why the camp is so important, eh?
{@LinkCreature:11#1009#Red Lash reapers} want this camp. And we're not giving it to them!
